title: PhysicalBitcoinArt
author: PhysicalBitcoinArt
content: Hi there, I've posted on here before over the past year and wanted to share that I am auctioning this collectible #2 of 21 Limited Edition 22" MDF CNC carved round. This round has orange colored epoxy poured and very unique. (I don't know how to post photographs on here at the moment and I've tried to sign up for a higher level account but it didn't work.)Starting bid to cover costs to make is $250 or 0.011 #BTC    Will end on Saturday February 11th.S&H free within USA, if over $300**I updated it with this tweet**The auction ends Saturday evening or so!I'll be donating 10% (if sold for over $300) to the Turkey Earthquake fund that has been shared.If over $500, I'll donate 21%! Not trying to make a profit on this, $250 doesn't even cover S&H...https://geyser.fund/project/earthquakereliefturkey@geyserfundhttps://twitter.com/BitcoinDesigns/status/1622408960505704448    Link to the Artwork or my profile on Twitter is - @BitcoinDesignsIf you'd like to bid on here, that is fine. I will transfer with a screenshot to the thread. Thank you for viewing and the support!

comments.author: tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: PhysicalBitcoinArt on February 10, 2023, 06:07:49 AMHi there, I've posted on here before over the past year and wanted to share that I am auctioning this collectible #2 of 21 Limited Edition 22" MDF CNC carved round. This round has orange colored epoxy poured and very unique. (I don't know how to post photographs on here at the moment and I've tried to sign up for a higher level account but it didn't work.)Starting bid to cover costs to make is $250 or 0.011 #BTC    Will end on Saturday February 11th.S&H free within USA, if over $300**I updated it with this tweet**The auction ends Saturday evening or so!I'll be donating 10% (if sold for over $300) to the Turkey Earthquake fund that has been shared.If over $500, I'll donate 21%! Not trying to make a profit on this, $250 doesn't even cover S&H...https://geyser.fund/project/earthquakereliefturkey@geyserfundhttps://twitter.com/BitcoinDesigns/status/1622408960505704448    Link to the Artwork or my profile on Twitter is - @BitcoinDesignsIf you'd like to bid on here, that is fine. I will transfer with a screenshot to the thread. Thank you for viewing and the support! I have uploaded some photos for you, found on your twitter account. Hope that helps. Good luck with your auction

comments.author: PhysicalBitcoinArt
comments.body: Thank you so much for sharing the photos! I really appreciate the help!

comments.author: geophphreigh
comments.body: PhysicalBitcoinArt - Thank you for posting the auction here. I really do like this item, but hesitate to place a bid because the auction terms are extremely vague, I'm not even sure if the auction is being held here in this thread or on twitter? For example, statements like this make it hard to determine an actual winner if there is not a determined end time:Quote from: PhysicalBitcoinArt on February 10, 2023, 06:07:49 AM...The auction ends Saturday evening or so!...Unclear terms only leaves you and any bidders open to arguments, scams, and manipulation of the auction. I would hate to see it devolve as this seems to be a legitimate item and auction. I would recommend reading this thread on how to buy/sell/set up an auction (there is even an auction template) and be sure to include things like:Start and end date and time including time zone.Minimum bid increments.Payment details and/or expectations, payment address in OP, timeline etc.Sniping rules, auction end terms.etc.I hope this helps your auction. More clear terms may result in more interest, it would from me TBH. Geo

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Would also possibly be interested in bidding but would like to know prior sales/giveaways were successfully completed and they may not have been.
